requestBody.title: Adversary attempts unauthorized cross-biz read API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Notification Cadence and Noise-Control Policy. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Seat-Map Booking with Hold Timer. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
